tool_description: This api can be used to store student information, formulate student result that consist totalscores, gpa, cgpa, point, unit, commulative point, commulative unit e.t.c. It can be used to update student level, academic session, student department and faculty. It can also be used to remove student, remove all student at a level. And finally to get total student in the school
name: Student Result Api
title: Student Result Api

api_list.name: retrieve student results with matriculation number
api_list.description: This request is used to retrieve student results with matriculation number.

api_list.name: retrieve student results within level and faculty
api_list.description: This request is used to retrieve student results within level and faculty.

api_list.name: retrieve student results within level and department
api_list.description: This request is used to retrieve student results within level and department.

api_list.name: retrieve student results within level
api_list.description: This request is used to retrieve student results within the level.

api_list.name: retrieve student results within  faculty
api_list.description: This request is used to retrieve student results within the faculty.

api_list.name: retrieve student results within  department
api_list.description: This request is used to retrieve student results within the department.

api_list.name: retrieve student results by range
api_list.description: This request is used to retrieve student results within the school using range.

api_list.name: retrieve student results
api_list.description: This request is used to retrieve student results within the school.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://student-result-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/student-result/df80b9e7-cf2c-4e6e-80cf-1db72129dc65"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "student-result-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://student-result-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/student-result/{uid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "student-result-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
